tag_list: invajo, internetbolaget, squace, wrapp, fredrik-berglund, eventplanning
overview:
Serial entrepreneur within search, ecommerce and mobile sector.

Fredrik history in brief:

  • Founded and managed Ryce Directory Intelligence AB 2002 (acquired by Getupdated Internet Marketing (publ.) 2007)

Ryce was a search consultancy agency.

  • Founded Squace.com 2004. Partly acquired by Wrapp 2012.

Squace was a mobile browser and UI for handle mobile coupons

  • Founded and still manage Internetbolaget 2009

Internetbolaget is wholesaler to the SEO market by selling SEO infrastructure as IP, seo domains and server hosting.

  • Founded and still manage Invajo.com

Invajo is a website for online eventplanning.
